metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32142 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw linux/unix v0.20.0 allows attacker to escalate privileges via the LibRaw_buffer_datastream::gets(char*, int) in /src/libraw/src/libraw_datastream.cpp.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a stack overflow and is limited to a denial of service on Ubuntu because of compiler hardening features.

criterions.comment: darktable package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
rawtherapee package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ufraw package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
